statements: SELECT * FROM car_component_cost_breakdown;
SELECT component_name, cost FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT component_id, cost, component_name FROM car_component_cost_breakdown ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT component_name FROM car_component_cost_breakdown;
SELECT component_id, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM car_component_cost_breakdown GROUP BY component_id;
SELECT * FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY component_name DESC
SELECT component_name, cost FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE component_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT component_id, component_name, cost FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1500 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT DISTINCT component_name FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE cost < 1000
SELECT AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM car_component_cost_breakdown WHERE component_name LIKE 'Engine%'
SELECT * FROM car_components;
SELECT component_name, component_cost FROM car_components ORDER BY component_cost DESC;
SELECT component_name, component_cost FROM car_components WHERE component_id = 3;
SELECT component_name, component_cost, component_id FROM car_components WHERE component_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE budget_amount > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_components WHERE component_cost > 5000;
SELECT component_name, component_cost FROM car_components WHERE component_id = 2;
SELECT component_id, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM budget_planning GROUP BY component_id;
SELECT component_name, report_date FROM car_components JOIN budget_planning ON car_components.component_id = budget_planning.component_id;
SELECT component_cost, budget_amount FROM car_components JOIN budget_planning ON car_components.component_id = budget_planning.component_id WHERE component_cost < budget_amount;
SELECT * FROM cars
SELECT car_model, car_make FROM cars WHERE car_year = 2021
SELECT car_model, car_make, car_year FROM cars WHERE car_make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY car_year ASC
SELECT component_name, component_type, component_cost FROM car_components ORDER BY component_cost DESC

SELECT cars.car_model, car_components.component_name, cost_breakdown.total_cost FROM cars JOIN cost_breakdown ON cars.car_id = cost_breakdown.car_id JOIN car_components ON cost_breakdown.component_id = car_components.component_id
SELECT * FROM car_components WHERE component_type = 'Engine';
SELECT car_model, car_make, car_year FROM cars ORDER BY car_year DESC;
SELECT component_name, AVG(component_cost) AS average_cost FROM car_components GROUP BY component_type;

SELECT cars.car_model, car_components.component_name, cost_breakdown.quantity FROM cars INNER JOIN cost_breakdown ON cars.car_id = cost_breakdown.car_id INNER JOIN car_components ON cost_breakdown.component_id = car_components.component_id;

SELECT car_year, component_name, quantity FROM cars INNER JOIN cost_breakdown ON cars.car_id = cost_breakdown.car_id INNER JOIN car_components ON cost_breakdown.component_id = car_components.component_id WHERE quantity > 2;
SELECT * FROM car_components;
SELECT component_name, cost FROM car_components ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT car_name, manufacturing_year FROM cars WHERE manufacturing_year > 2010;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM components_suppliers;

SELECT component_name, cost, supplier_name FROM car_components JOIN component_costs ON car_components.component_id = component_costs.component_id JOIN components_suppliers ON component_costs.supplier_id = components_suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM car_components;
SELECT car_name, manufacturing_year FROM cars WHERE manufacturing_year > 2010;
SELECT component_name, cost FROM car_components ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM components_suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City%';

SELECT c.component_name, s.supplier_name, cc.cost FROM car_components c JOIN component_costs cc ON c.component_id = cc.component_id JOIN components_suppliers s ON cc.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE cc.cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM car_components;
SELECT component_name, component_cost FROM car_components WHERE component_cost > 100;
SELECT car_name, car_model, car_year FROM cars ORDER BY car_year DESC;
SELECT component_name, quantity FROM component_usage INNER JOIN car_components ON component_usage.component_id = car_components.component_id;
SELECT report_name, total_cost FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cars WHERE car_year = 2020 ORDER BY car_name ASC;
SELECT car_name, car_model, car_year FROM cars WHERE car_year > 2018 AND car_model LIKE '%SUV%' ORDER BY car_year DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date, total_cost FROM reports WHERE total_cost >= 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT c.component_name, c.component_cost, cu.quantity FROM car_components c JOIN component_usage cu ON c.component_id = cu.component_id WHERE cu.quantity > 10 ORDER BY c.component_cost DESC;
SELECT cp.report_id, r.report_name, cp.budget_amount FROM budget_planning cp JOIN reports r ON cp.report_id = r.report_id WHERE cp.budget_amount < 10000 ORDER BY r.report_name ASC;
